title: A Joyful Life - Novel Updates
author: Lu Yingong   鲁引弓
description: Feng Yifan, who was just about to take the National College Entrance Exam, suddenly asked to change his major and became a turning point for the family that was on the merge of breaking apart. The worried mother and the busy father realized that it’s a completely new era. Their experience was no longer enough and they have to reprepare themselves to become the parents of a graduating son. The child who was emotionally impacted, and during this life-changing exam, he has to swim against the flow. This novel is about school life told from the perspective of three different families, and how each family’s children pushed through their final exams. Out of the three families, there was one who didn’t understand their child, one who cared too much about their child, and one who didn’t care about their child. Keep reading this exciting and inspirational story!>
